definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: For water intake pump house pressure water test shall be made on the bedrock so as to define its permeability.
sentences.chinese: 取水泵房处在基岩中进行压水试验，以确定其透水性。

sentences.english: Coal mine flooding accident occurred in Inner Mongolia Wuhai.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古乌海发生煤矿透水事故。

sentences.english: The technology of casting tetrahedron-like penetrating frames for protecting levee and fixing revetment is a newly developed technology.
sentences.chinese: 抛投四面六边透水框架群是一种新的护堤固岸技术。

sentences.english: Coarse mesh fabric has high porosity with efficient water filtration.
sentences.chinese: 粗网目基布之开孔率高，具有高透水特性。

sentences.english: Thus clays and shales tend to be impermeable .
sentences.chinese: 因此粘土和页岩就往往不透水。

sentences.english: Thus clays and shales tend to be impermeable.
sentences.chinese: 因此粘土和页岩就往往不透水。

sentences.english: Do not cover the mower with impermeable materials- such as plastic sheets.
sentences.chinese: 不要用塑料布等不透水材料覆盖割草机。

sentences.english: There was a waterproof canopy over the platform.
The outer covering of the egg is waterproofed to prevent the embryo from drying out.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋的外壳是不透水的，防止胚胎失水。

sentences.english: Clothing that is impermeable to water prevents the evaporation of sweat from the skin.
sentences.chinese: 穿着不透水的衣服会阻碍体表汗液的蒸发。

sentences.english: Carry on dangerous appraisal of mine water leakage accident while regarding tunneling face as an example.
sentences.chinese: 以掘进工作面为例，进行矿井透水事故危险性评价。

sentences.english: The Great Firewall is hardly an impermeable barrier these days.
sentences.chinese: 当今的中国网络防火墙不再是不透水的屏障。

sentences.english: Recent-applied permeable pavement has a bright future in our countrys engineering.
sentences.chinese: 我国新近应用的透水性路面具有很好的工程前景。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
base solvent (of chemical compound)/stroma (framing biological tissue)
to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
